name: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
description: Pokémon Detective Pikachu is a movie starring Ryan Reynolds, Kathryn Newton, and Suki Waterhouse. In a world where people collect Pokémon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.
keywords: live action cgi hybrid,cinematic universe,shared universe,based on video game,pokemon
